benifits.description: The combination of Tea Tree, Neem & Salicylic Acid kills bacteria while Aloe Vera heals & locks in moisture. With this salicylic acid cleanser by your side, you would never have to worry about acne or pimples.

benifits.title: Removes Tan
benifits.description: The combination of Saffron & Carrot Seed Oil removes tan from the upper layer of the skin while restoring natural glow. Indulge in the age-old tradition of Ubtan and let your skin rejoice in the natural goodness of Turmeric, Saffron & Carrot seed Oil, known best for tan removal

benifits.title: Repairs Sun Damage
benifits.description: Walnut Beads gently exfoliate dead skin cells to remove impurities while unearthing the smooth, bright skin underneath. Bid goodbye to sun damage with this natural Ubtan Face Wash.

benifits.title: Brightens Skin
benifits.description: Turmeric, rich in antioxidants, protects the skin cells from free radical damage and brightens the skin tone while improving the skin texture and complexion. It retains moisture balance to make the skin soft and supple.

blogs.title: New Launch – Mamaearth Lip Serums
blogs.desc: A tinted lip serum is something that combines the best of hydration, color, and extra nourishment, all in one little tube. Here are some reasons to choose lip serums from Mamaearth.
blogs.author: PRATIBHA PAL
blogs.summary: “If you’re sad, add more lipstick and attack“. ~ Coco Chanel It’s incredible how a dab of color on a small part of your face can make so much difference, but it does. There’s even a term for this in economics – the ‘Lipstick Effect’. It refers to women buying lipsticks as a small indulgence during tough times like recessions, economic crises – or pandemics!Since we’re all in need of some cheer now more than ever before, it seems like a good time to get yourself a little tube of lip color. However, while you’re at it, why not get in some lip care too? This brings us to a brand-new world – of tinted lip serums!

questions.a: Like face serums, lip serums are more deeply absorbed into the skin. The formulation is generally thinner due to smaller molecules, due to which they can penetrate better into the skin and carry the nutrients deeper. This is why lip serums work better than lip balms for specific concerns like dryness, lack of volume, and even fine lines.

If you’ve used solid lipsticks, you’ll find that they don’t appear as pigmented on your lips as they do in the tube. They have a rather translucent nature, which is due to the way they are formulated. On the other hand, a tinted lip serum is highly pigmented and creates an opaque layer on your lips giving you the exact color you desire

This isn’t just a liquid lipstick – it’s a tinted lip serum. Most matte lipsticks dry out the skin and you have to reapply or refresh with lip balm. However, a tinted lip serum has hydration built into it, which makes sure that no matter how matte your lips are, they’ll stay hydrated and nourished all day.

view-description.title: Accelerate Hair Growth with Mamaearth Onion Hair Range
view-description.content: Onions, normally seen as a kitchen staple, have many other uses, a lot of it, to do with hair health. The anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial properties of onions go a long way in promoting hair growth as well as enhancing its strength and appearance. Onions are known to provide nourishment to hair follicles. Rich in sulfur, potassium, and antioxidants, they help in reducing hair fall and accelerating hair regrowth. Besides, onions contain many compounds that help repair damaged hair.

view-description.title: What Makes Mamaearth Stand Out?
view-description.content: Mamaearth is Asia’s first brand with Made Safe Certified products® that are free from toxins, Parabens, Phthalates, Mineral Oils, and Sulfates. Additionally, our products are also cruelty-free & PETA-certified. Committed to environmental sustainability,  we ensure that we recycle twice as much plastic as we use. What is more, by buying Mamaearth products, you can make your contribution to a green planet, as we plant a tree every time you buy from us! #GoodnessInside.

view-benifits.title: Benefits of Using Onion For Hair
view-benifits.desc: Mamaearth  come enriched with the goodness of Onion to help your hair grow faster, longer and healthier. But before we introduce you to our Onion hair products, let’s look at some of their benefits:

que.a: Onions are known to provide nutrients and nourishment to hair follicles, thereby promoting hair growth. The nutrients also increase hair volume, shine and improve hair strength while minimizing breakage and thinning.

Onions contain many compounds that help to restore dry, damaged hair. Flavonoids present in onions have antioxidant properties as well as vasodilatory properties that help promote blood flow to the scalp. Increased blood flow helps in controlling hair loss as well as in accelerating hair growth.
The anti-inflammatory qualities of Onions help soothe an itchy, dry scalp. Besides, the antibacterial properties of Onions help fight scalp infections.
